snippet.title: Hotel Business Simulator | Gameplay Trailer!
snippet.description: "Hotel Business Simulator" puts you in charge of crafting the ultimate hotel empire. Upgrade rooms, cater to guests' whims, set rates wisely, and maintain spotless standards to transform your establishment into a luxurious resort. Build, decorate, and run the hotel of your dreams to become a hospitality mogul! 💸⭐️
